casebody.data:
SKINNER et al.
v.
PREFERRED CREDIT et al. No. 525A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. Gary K. Shipman, William G. Wright, Wilmington, A. Holt Rowell, III, Daniel Myers, Mt. Pleasant, SC, Eric G. Calhoun, Dallas, TX, for Skinners, et al. Hada V. Haulsee, Ronald R. Davis, Bradley R. Johnson, Winston-Salem, for Preferred Credit Trust. Robert R. Marcus, Angela L. Little, Greensboro, Daniel J. Tobin, for Impac Funding. Gary R. Govert, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Attorney General. Seth P. Rosebrock, for CRL. Carlene McNulty, for N.C. Justice Center. Kenneth L. Schorr, Charlotte, for LSSP. William J. Whalen, for Pisgah Legal Services. Susan Gottsegen, Winston-Salem, for LASNNC. Maria D. McIntyre, Charlotte, for FPLC. Robert A. Singer, Kathleen Gleason, Greensboro, for NC Bankers Asso.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of February 2006 by Amicus Curiae, Roy Cooper, to Participate in Oral Argument:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of March 2006."
